properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , ADMIN_STATUS FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND ADMIN_STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO FAQ ( FAQ_NO , USER_NO , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_ANSWER ) VALUES ( SEQ_FAQ.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT FAQ_NO , USER_NO , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_ANSWER , FAQ_ENROLLDATE , FAQ_COUNT FROM FAQ ORDER BY FAQ_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT FAQ_NO , USER_NO , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_ANSWER , FAQ_ENROLLDATE , FAQ_COUNT FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_NO = ?
UPDATE FAQ SET FAQ_TITLE = ? , FAQ_ANSWER = ? WHERE FAQ_NO = ?
